name: Blue (itch) (POLE 3D, Omadel)
description:
Global Warming

This chart represents The evolution of the global temperatures from the 20th century

Blue is a short experience that aims to raise awareness about the human inpact on the global warming, specificaly the ice meltings.

You control a polar bear named Georges but unfortunately he is a collateral victim of the human accentuated global warming living in a dying ecosystem.

Etienne Javelle : Developer

Elie Bouillard : Developer

Découture Nicolas : VFX / 3D Art / Animator

Félix Coeugniet : Environment Artist / Props Artist
